author: jwasinger
content: ah okay.  so normal `//` actually works in f-strings.  I think I was conflating an error from something else as being caused by "mal-formatted" comments.

author: jwasinger
content: another question:  how do you recommend running the CI for `execution-spec-tests` locally?  I have tried running `tox` standalone as well as using https://github.com/nektos/act to run the entire workflow locally but I'm getting errors from both of these.
